Summary: 3 starlike orb ufo east of surry power station.
trends: There have been no other sightings in surry power station
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI just got of work and was heading to my car when I noticed three bright star like orbs east of the power plant. They hovered and descended and where making 90 degree direction changes for about just over 70 seconds and then they just disappeared.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
